name: Retrokingdom Old Lands
description:
# Retrokingdom old lands

A retro game based on the great game Kingdom: classic. 

Using the Godot engine we wanted to give to the game the look and feel of the Commodore 64 with modernised tools. 

# How to play: 

You need to defend your village by hiring builders and knights and constructing the walls. You only need three buttons: A, S and D. You can move with A and D, and drop your coins with S or space. 

Survive as long as you can and comment the number of days you score!

Look for homeless people and chests full of coins around the map!
